ygData.subject: Re: What good are scalers and files?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re joking, right?  Files are used for making studs and boning and a slew of other thing, some not even related to tailorinh... scalers, on the other
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:21 4/29/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
>Can you USE scalers and files? Are they FOR anything? Or just for
>practice?

You're joking, right? Files are used for making studs and boning and a
slew of other thing, some not even related to tailorinh... scalers, on the
other hand, I have no idea.

>
>Can you sell the lanterns to PC's? (in other words, do they work?)
>
>And a big hello to Yizzlar!! Didn't know you were a master smith!
>
>
>Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric - Begining smith!
>
>
